title: VSB Power LSTM attention
description: This notebook was made from scratch by me. The idea is reducing the 800,000 long mesurements to some shorter vector that is more fitted to a LSTM. This code below transform the 800.000 mesurements of the 3 diferent phases in a unique (80, 39) matrix. The matthews ocrrelation and attention functions are not mine.
description_lemmatized: notebook made scratch idea reducing 800000 long mesurements shorter vector fitted lstm code transform 800000 mesurements 3 diferent phase unique 80 39 matrix matthew ocrrelation attention function mine
